title: Could I possibly unbanned?
body:
So my account got perma banned for "sharing account". Which was 2 years ago, season 8 is here and I was wondering if the account could get unbanned? Somehow? I mean didn't Tyler didn't unbanned and he's toxic? My case is sharing........ 

If you unban me, I swear I won't share the account. I've been share-free for 2 years to prove my worthiness! This is a serious post to reconfirm.

replies.body: If it's been found that the account was shared, the only way the suspension would be lifted is once the original creator writes in to recover it.
Should I say that the account got banned for being shared, and that I'm the original owner? I wonder if that's enough to get unban..
Little more complicated than that, but I do see where you're going with it. We'd be able to see signs of compromise, and then need to verify who the original owner is to return the account to.
Tyler1 got ID banned though, he didn't get any of his accounts back. Pretty sure all bans are permanent.
I've found some forums online with people saying their accounts got unbanned. Some even said they got their accounts unbanned at lol events.

Accouts which get Banned never get unbanned. Tylers banned Accounts never got unbanned. Your only way to play again is to create a new Account, unless Riot unbanns the Account if the ban was a Fail from the System which i don't think. And btw how do you know that the Person you Shared account with didn't just use your Account or did you change your Password?
I'm certain the account got banned, because I actually had a dispute with the reply mod.
